Desc.entry: A voluntary organisation which aims to work with the local community and Sheffield City Council to improve community safety, improve public transport links to the area and safegard the local environment by reducing litter, increasing recycling and protecting local wildlife. The forum engages with local councillors to ensure the community is actively involved in decision making processes with the objective of improving the quality of local facilities. The Forum helps to publicise meetings, events and activities held in the community and organises fundraising activities with the objective of improving local amenities. Open to all.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: No regular meetings are held but events and activities are publicised through e-mailing lists and posters

category.entry: COMMUNITY FORUMS AND LOCAL ACTION GROUPS
